translation: A volume of the Avalokitêśvara Ruyilun Yoga

source_sentence: 開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
translation: Hongxing Qing Suguo, Specially Advanced Examination of the Third Secretary of the Kaifu Ritual

source_sentence: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
translation: The duke received a grant of 3,000 households and was given the purple color, and was given the title of secretary-general, "Great Confirmation.

source_sentence: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門
translation: Sanzang Shaman of Daxingshan Temple, Correctly Named Dagong Zhi

source_sentence: 不空奉　詔譯
translation: Amoghasiddhi Translation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 我今順瑜伽　　金剛頂經說
translation: I will now follow the yoga, as explained in the Vajraśekhara-sūtra

source_sentence: 摩尼蓮花部　　如意念誦法
translation: Maṇi Lianhuapuṣpa Method of Mindfulness of Recitation

source_sentence: 修此三昧故　　能如觀自在
translation: As a result of cultivating this concentration, one can observe freely as one wishes

source_sentence: 先擇其弟子　　族姓敬法者
translation: those who first chose their disciples, their clans, and respected the Dharma

source_sentence: 多人所敬愛　　智慧而勇進
translation: beloved by many, wise and courageous

source_sentence: 決定毘離耶　　覺慧常不捨
translation: determined vīrya, awakened wisdom, and always unabandoned

source_sentence: 盡孝於父母　　淨信於三寶
translation: to be dutiful to one's father and mother and to have pure faith in the Three Treasures

source_sentence: 樂修菩提行　　於四無量心
translation: Enjoying the practice of enlightenment In the four immeasurable states of mind

source_sentence: 剎那無有間　　常樂大乘法
translation: moment-to-moment infinity, always delighting in the great vehicle teaching

source_sentence: 住於菩薩戒　　恭敬阿闍梨
translation: abide in the bodhisattva precepts and venerate the preceptor

source_sentence: 一切諸聖者　　成就堅固力
translation: all the noble ones who have achieved resolute power

source_sentence: 丈夫之勇猛　　善通相應門
translation: the boldness of a great man who well understands the associated approach

source_sentence: 常樂寂靜行　　智慧無所畏
translation: always enjoying the practice of quiescence, having no fear of wisdom

source_sentence: 以戒常嚴身　　精修祕密乘
translation: to adhere to the body of constant discipline and to cultivate the esoteric vehicle

source_sentence: 敬依理趣道　　一心無所悋
translation: relying on the path of principle, one mind is free of any stinginess

source_sentence: 常樂聞妙法　　曾入三昧耶
translation: always delighting in hearing the wonderful Dharma, having entered samaya

source_sentence: 從師獲灌頂　　既蒙印可已
translation: having received the consecration from the master, he has been approved by the seal of approval

source_sentence: 不久當成就　　弟子具此相
translation: Soon will he attain... this is the mark of a disciple

source_sentence: 方可為傳授　　此即如意寶
translation: only then can it be transmitted This is the jewel of Tathāgata's mind

source_sentence: 能成諸事業　　如經說處所
translation: able to accomplish various undertakings as the scriptures explain the location

source_sentence: 山間及流水　　清淨阿蘭若
translation: mountains and flowing water pure forest

source_sentence: 隨樂之澗谷　　離諸危怖難
translation: to follow the valleys of pleasure and escape from perilous hardships

source_sentence: 隨力嚴供具　　行人面於西
translation: making offerings according to one's strength, facing west on the path

source_sentence: 漫提自在王　　次禮餘方佛
translation: Maṇḍi-śreṣṭha King Next, we worship the buddhas of the other directions

source_sentence: 以五輪著地　　如教之敬禮
translation: to touch the ground with the five elements and venerate as instructed

source_sentence: 雙膝長跪已　　合掌虛心住
translation: having knelt with both knees extended, he joins his palms and stands with an open mind

source_sentence: 誠心盡陳說　　三業一切罪
translation: to explain in detail with sincerity all the sins of the three activities

source_sentence: 我從過去世　　流轉於生死
translation: I have been in transmigration through birth and death since past lives

source_sentence: 今對大聖尊　　盡心而懺悔
translation: I now confess my sins to the great sage, with all my heart

source_sentence: 如先佛所懺　　我今亦如是
translation: as the buddhas before me had confessed, so now I am

source_sentence: 願承加持力　　眾生悉清淨
translation: May I inherit the power of the empowerment that purifies all sentient beings

source_sentence: 以此大願故　　自他獲無垢
translation: because of this great vow, self and others attain purity

source_sentence: 密言曰。
translation: The secret words are.

source_sentence: 唵　薩婆婆　嚩輸馱　薩婆達麼　薩嚩婆嚩輸度唅行者次應隨喜一切諸佛菩薩所集福智(思一切佛菩薩過去所修行功德如我自作而生歡喜)。
translation: "Om sarvabhāva-vaśuddhâvadharma sarvabhva-vaśuddhodhva who practices should then rejoice in the merits and wisdom accumulated by all the buddhas and bodhisattvas (rejoice when he considers the merits of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas who have cultivated in the past as I have done myself).

source_sentence: 過現三世佛　　菩薩及眾聖
translation: past, present, and future buddhas, bodhisattvas, and sages.

source_sentence: 所集諸善根　　合掌盡隨喜
translation: all the good roots that are gathered, join your palms and rejoice in them.

source_sentence: 如我身所集　　歡喜無有異
translation: as I have gathered in myself, rejoicing in nothing different

source_sentence: 次應右膝著地芙蓉合掌置於頂上。
translation: Next, he should touch his right knee to the ground and place his palms together on top of his head.

source_sentence: 想禮一切如來菩薩足。
translation: He should contemplate venerating the feet of the bodhisattva, the universal tathāgata.

source_sentence: 密言曰。
translation: He said in code.

source_sentence: 唵鉢頭麼(二合)微(微古反)
translation: "Om padma (dharma) we (weiguo).

source_sentence: 禮諸佛已全跏半跏。
translation: After worshiping the buddhas, he sat cross-legged and half-lotted.

source_sentence: 或輪王跏。
translation: He might sit cross-legged as a wheel-turning king.

source_sentence: 隨意而坐。
translation: He sits as he wishes.

source_sentence: 作此坐印已　　觀遍虛空佛
translation: After making this mudrā, he contemplates the buddhas pervading space.

source_sentence: 己身各於前　　住彼眾聖會
translation: each in his own body abiding in the assembly of the sages

source_sentence: 止觀從膝上　　旋舞當心合
translation: Zhiguan guan from the knees, whirling and dancing while mentally united

source_sentence: 如蓮之未敷　　想禮於諸佛
translation: like the lotus before its bloom, one wishes to worship the buddhas

source_sentence: 次結三昧耶　　當心堅固縛
translation: "Next, I will form a samaya, and I will firmly bind my mind to it.

source_sentence: 檀慧禪智竪　　金剛蓮花印
translation: (Skt. vajra-renunciant) seal of the meditation wisdom of the donor

source_sentence: 通持蓮花者　　警覺眾聖已
translation: He who holds the lotus flower in common has awakened the sages

source_sentence: 誦此密言曰
translation: Recite these esoteric words, saying.

source_sentence: 唵跋折羅鉢頭麼三麼耶薩怛梵(三合)　由結此印故　　佛及善逝子　諸大名稱者　　妙觀察攝受　憶昔本誓願　　對於遍照尊　不違教令故　　加持使圓滿次結一切諸佛如來安悅意歡喜三昧耶印。
translation: (Sanskrit: bhāṣara-padma-samaya-satatvan) Because of this seal, the buddhas and sons of Sugata, the great names, delicately observe and accept them, recall their past vows, face the universally illuminating honored one, and don't disobey the teaching, they are sustained and made to complete the samaya seal of the well-being and joy of all buddhas and tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 十度堅固縛　　忍願中交合
translation: These ten perfections are firmly bound together in forbearance and vow.

source_sentence: 檀慧與禪智　　各相合而竪
translation: the wisdom of the giving of alms and the wisdom of meditation each combine to form the other

source_sentence: 密言曰。
translation: The secret words are.

source_sentence: 唵　三麼耶乎(去引)蘇囉多薩怛梵(三合)　由示此印故　　諸佛及菩薩　一切執金剛　　皆悉妙歡喜　次當開心戶　　入金剛智字　觀於二乳上　　右怛囉左吒　如宮室戶扇　　殊勝金剛縛　三業同時發　　拍心開兩字密言曰。
translation: "Om Samayahu (deprecatory) surāta-sattvam (triad) because of this sign, the buddhas and bodhisattvas who all possess the vajra are all wonderfully joyous. Next, you should open the door of your mind and enter the letter vajra wisdom. Look at the two breasts, observe the right tārā and left tha, like a door in a palace, and the extraordinary vajra binding that arises from three karmic activities simultaneously.

source_sentence: 唵跋日囉(二合)滿馱(平)怛羅(二合)吒(半音)　無始熏種子　　所集之塵勞　今以召罪印　　集之欲摧碎　十度堅固縛　　忍願伸如針　進力屈如鉤　　心想召諸罪　想彼眾罪狀　　植髮裸黑形　及印刺於心　　觸已誦密語　三業相應故　　能召諸罪積　誦此召集已　　方作摧碎法密言曰。
translation: "Om vajra (dichotomy) maṇḍala (dichotomy) tārā (dichotomy) tcha (dichotomy) The seeds of beginningless perfuming, the accumulated dust and trouble, and now the seal that summons sins, the desire to assemble them, and the ten strong fetters of the ten perfections, the vow to tolerate them like a needle, the power to advance, and the bending of the mind like a hook, the thoughts that summon sins, the images of their many sins, the planting of their hair, their naked and black forms, and the seal that pierces their hearts, the recitation of the secret words after touching them, the correspondence of the three actions, and the ability to summon the accumulation of sins. After reciting this summons, then the method of assassination is created, and the secret words are.

source_sentence: 唵薩婆播波迦哩灑拏尾(入)輸馱(入)娜三摩耶跋日囉(二合)吽若(入)　召入於掌已　　方作摧碎法　前印內相叉　　稱[牟*含]縛諸罪　忍願俱伸直　　有怛囉吒字　想為金剛杵　　相拍如摧山　忿句及怒形　　能淨諸惡趣　誦已忍願拍　　三七隨所宜密言曰。
translation: "After summoning it into his palm, he then creates the Dhāraṇī of destruction. The previous sign is internally sarva-pakkari-saṃnarī, which names [mu*han] the sins that are bound, and he extends and straightens the vows of patience. He conceives the Sanskrit letter tārāṣa as a vajra, beats it together like a crushing mountain, and its angry phrase and wrathful form purify the bad destinies. After reciting it, he beats the vows of patience three or seven times as appropriate, saying.

source_sentence: 唵跋日囉(二合)播尼尾薩普吒也薩婆播也滿馱娜儞鉢囉(二合)母乞灑(二合)也薩婆播也蘖底(丁以反)避藥(二合重呼)薩婆薩怛挽薩婆怛他蘖多跋日囉(二合)三磨也吽怛囉(二合)吒(半音)　以此相應故　　先佛方便說　三業所積罪　　無量極重障　作此摧滅已　　如火焚枯草　有情常愚迷　　不知此理趣　如來大悲故　　開此祕妙門　次當結入印　　內如來智字　二羽堅固縛　　禪智入於中　以進力二度　　相拄如環勢　觀前八葉蓮　　其上置阿字　二點嚴飾故　　妙字方名阿　色白如珂雪　　流散千光明　想以進力支　　捻字安心內　三業齊運用　　誦此密言曰唵跋日囉(二合)阿(引)味捨(平聲)惡(入)　既想入心中　　字相逾光耀　此即法界體　　行者應是觀　不久悟寂靜　　法本不生故　三世諸如來　　金剛身口意　皆以妙方便　　持在金剛拳　以此闔心門　　智字獲堅固　便屈進力度　　住於禪智背　以印觸胸已　　即誦此妙言唵跋日囉(二合)母瑟致[牟*含]　行者住等引　　二羽堅固縛　仰置於臍下　　禪智蓮花形　此名三昧印　　誦此密言曰唵三摩地鉢頭迷(二合)紇哩(短)　出息及入息　　住阿那波那　想佛遍虛空　　彈指警覺我　佛子汝云何　　成無上等覺　不知諸如來　　實相之妙法　既聞警覺已　　行者復白言　云何名真實　　願最勝尊說　諸佛皆歡喜　　作如是勝言　善哉摩訶薩　　能作如是問　汝想於心中　　所內惡字門　以字徹於心　　誦此密言曰唵止(入)多鉢囉(二合)底(平)味鄧迦路弭　當默誦一遍　　便想為月輪　倍欲精進故　　復誦妙言曰唵步提止(入)多母(去)怛跛(二合)陀夜弭(平)　能令心月輪　　圓滿甚清淨　中想妙蓮花　　上安寶金剛密言曰。
translation: "Om vajra(bhāra)pāṇi-viṣayaprāpta-saṃṭhaya-saṃbhāva-pāṇi, maṇḍala-jīva-pāṇi, saṃbhāva-pāṇi, tiller (ding-yi reversed), saṃbhasattva-pāṇi, saṃbhattala-vartan tiller, vajra(bhāra)samādhi, and untārā(bhāra)za (half-sound).

source_sentence: 唵底瑟奼麼尼(上)跋日囉(二合)鉢娜麼(二合)　引量同虛空　　周遍於三界　復誦此妙言　　金剛語離聲唵薩頗(二合上)囉麼尼(上)跋日囉(二合)鉢娜麼(二合)　於此引妙蓮　　流放千光焰　一一光明中　　無量佛剎土　剎中有妙蓮　　想持寶蓮者　持寶蓮勝幢　　幢中出妙聲　誰有薄福者　　當滿一切願　住是寂三昧　　為利諸有情　如是菩薩類　　皆住於等引　從蓮花胎藏　　放千妙光明　皆為利眾生　　檀波羅蜜等　遍入諸三昧　　理趣善巧門　為愍念有情　　作無量方便　化身為種種　　從生及涅槃　轉大妙法輪　　皆從意寶出　所說之妙法　　皆以輪成就　以輪為妙智　　能斷諸結使　由轉妙法輪　　此為福智路　次皆正觀察　　漸斂其智蓮密言曰。
translation: "Om tiṣer dig māṇi (supra) vajra rāja (dichotomy) pāna māsa (dichotomy), which draws in measure like space and pervades the three realms. Again, reciting these wonderful words, the vajra speaks in a free voice, Om svabhā (dichotomy) rāja māṇi (supra) vajra rāja (dichotomy) pāna māsa (dichotomy), which draws in the wonderful lotus, radiates a thousand flames of light, and in each light there are measureless buddha buddhas and lands, and in those buddhas there are wonderful lotuses.

source_sentence: 唵僧訶囉麼尼跋日囉(二合)鉢娜麼　所在諸如來　　皆入為一體　猶如於明鏡　　能現於萬像　法界自性體　　住於金剛蓮　即變其寶蓮　　為真多菩薩　手持如意寶　　六臂身金色　皆想於自身　　頂髻寶莊嚴　冠坐自在王　　住於說法相　第一手思惟　　愍念有情故　第二持意寶　　能滿一切願　第三持念珠　　為度傍生苦　左按光明山　　成就無傾動　第二持蓮手　　能淨諸非法　第三挈輪手　　能轉無上法　六臂廣博體　　能遊於六道　以大悲方便　　斷諸有情苦　行者如是觀　　坐於月輪中　身流千光明　　項背皆圓光　復想心月輪　　亦有寶蓮花　以是能堅固　　無動觀已身　為離諸妄想　　誦此密言曰唵儞哩(二合)茶(去)底瑟姹(二合)囉怛娜跋日囉(二合)鉢娜麼(二合)怛麼(二合)句唅三摩喻唅摩訶三摩喻唅薩婆怛他孽多避三菩地囉怛娜跋日囉(二合)鉢娜麼(二合)怛麼(二合)句唅　以此法如持　　十度芙蓉合　進力屈如寶　　印心額喉頂　吽字想於心　　怛囉安於額　訖哩當喉上　　惡字置於頂　猶布此想故　　此身如金剛　復誦此密語　　蓮花語為聲唵囉怛娜跋日囉(二合)達磨紇哩(二合)　次應結灌頂　　智者合蓮掌　進力如寶形　　禪智開相遠　置額誦密語　　心想佛灌頂唵鉢娜麼(二合)苾哩俱胝多(入)致囉怛娜鉢娜麼(二合)避(入)囇罽囉阿避詵(去)者[牟*含]怛洛　即以此妙印　　二手分兩邊　如繫蓮花鬘　　徐徐前下散　想垂白帶勢　　誦此妙言曰唵鉢娜麼(二合)麼隷(平)[牟*含]紇哩怛洛　次當結甲鎧　　二手蓮花形　從心繞向背　　從背當臍繞　向腰及兩膝　　漸上繞頸後　從頸復當喉　　復於頭後繞　還來至額上　　却於頂後繞　徐徐前下散誦此祕密言。

source_sentence: 唵阿婆曳(平)鉢娜麼(二合)迦[牟*含]嚩制(平)滿馱囉託灑(二合)[牟*含]吽(合口)唅(平)　為喜諸佛故　　應拍蓮花印　二手結蓮掌　　妙拍令歡喜密言曰。
translation: "Om apāyat (ping) pāna-māsa (btn) kā [mu*hān] vaas (ping) pandhāra tosha (btn) [mu*hān] un (btn) mātṛk (btn) For the sake of rejoicing in the buddhas, you should clap the lotus flower seal, wrap your hands together with the lotus palms, and subtly clap it to make them rejoice, saying this secret chant.

source_sentence: 唵鉢娜麼(二合)覩使縠(引)
translation: "Om pana mo [sarva] tu tuigal (citation needed).

source_sentence: 想於己身前　　觀紇哩字門
translation: conception of the Uighur gate in front of one's body

source_sentence: 變為蓮花王　　中有紇哩字
translation: transformed into a lotus king with the character 紇 (Uighur) in its midst

source_sentence: 怛囉安兩邊　　為金剛寶蓮
translation: on either side of the tāraṇa are the adamantine lotus

source_sentence: 共變為所尊　　持真多妙寶
translation: honored as a shared transformer, holding true and many wonderful treasures

source_sentence: 如前己身觀　　今所觀亦然
translation: as in the preceding case, one's own body is contemplated, and so is what is contemplated now

source_sentence: 為令體無二　　次作呼召法
translation: in order to make the essence of the Dharma nondual, the next stage of the call is the dharma

source_sentence: 十度未敷蓮　　進力如鉤勢
translation: the ten unexpressed lotuses advance with power like the hook's gesture

source_sentence: 即誦此密語　　應為蓮花音
translation: instantly chant this esoteric teaching, which should be the sound of the lotus flower

source_sentence: 唵鉢娜麼(二合)摯拏那(二合下同)曩(長口引)句捨吽(合口引)唵鉢娜麼(二合)枳惹(二合)娜補瑟比吽　行者既召己　　次當結索印　如前合蓮掌　　進力拄如環　此名蓮花索　　能滿諸意願　應誦此密語　　召入於智身唵鉢娜麼(二合)至拏那阿母伽跛捨吽(合口引)　既入於智身　　為令無傾動　復當結蓮鎖　　應作決定心　如前合蓮掌　　進禪捻如環　力智亦復然　　相結如鉤鎖唵鉢娜麼(二合)至拏那塞怖(二合)吒吽　為令妙歡喜　　結蓮花鈴印　當以蓮花捧　　禪智入掌中　進力如環住　　誦此祕密語唵至拏娜鉢娜麼(二合)阿尾捨耶吽　次當誦蓮花　　百字祕密言　捧獻閼伽水　　以欝金白檀　龍腦兼諸花　　兩手捧供養唵鉢娜麼(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)三摩也(平)麼努播羅(去)也(平)鉢娜麼(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)帝尾(二合)努波底瑟姹(二合)儞哩(二合)拏護(二合)寐(平)婆嚩素覩瑟諭(二合)寐婆嚩阿努囉矩覩寐婆嚩素補瑟諭(二合)寐婆嚩薩婆悉地弭異(二合)鉢羅也磋(昌苛反)薩婆羯麼素者迷止多室利(二合)藥矩路(三合)吽(合口引)訶(去下同)訶訶訶穀婆伽梵薩婆怛他孽多鉢娜麼(二合)麼寐悶者(平)鉢娜寐婆嚩麼訶三麼也薩怛嚩(二合)紇哩(二合)　次以內外供　　供養蓮花王　所謂內供養　　芙蓉掌當心　禪智並伸直　　名為蓮花喜　應誦此密言唵摯拏(二合)那鉢娜麼(二合)囉細(引)吽　次結花鬘印　　以此而供養　不易前喜印　　二手捧向前　想種種寶鬘　　遍滿虛空界密言曰。
translation: Having summoned himself, he should then make the sign of the rope, close his palms as before, and advance with power like a ring. This is called the lotus-flower rope, which fills all wishes. You should recite this esoteric statement, summoning him into the wisdom body, and then summoning him to enter the wisdom body.

source_sentence: 唵摯拏(二合)娜鉢娜麼(二合)麼隷吽　次應以歌印　　奉獻智蓮者　復以前妙印　　屈掌挂諸度　從臍漸至口　　散下如寫勢　想緊那羅音　　供養諸聖者密言曰。
translation: "Om keṇua (bina) nabhāna-māsa (bina) moha-un. Next, you should make a song mudrā to offer to the wise lotus. Again, you should bow your palms and hang them over the salutations, gradually move them from your navel to your mouth, and scatter them down like a writing gesture.

source_sentence: 唵摯拏(二合)那鉢娜麼(二合)儗(研以反)帝(平)吽　次應結舞印　　前印左右旋　合芙蓉妙掌　　安於頂上散　由是四供養　　能獲大神通密言曰。
translation: "Om keṇua (btn) nabhanama (btn) skandha (btn) ti (btn) un. Next, you should make the mudrā (dance) sign. Turn the preceding sign from side to side, fold your palms together, place them on top of the head, and scatter them. Because of these four offerings, you'll attain great supernormal powers," the mantra goes.

source_sentence: 唵摯拏(二合)娜鉢娜麼(二合)儞俚(二合)帝(平)吽　作此四供養　　能成最勝事　次結外供養　　喜心而獻之　運心無邊界　　蓮花焚香法　諸佛誠言說　　為利諸有情　蓮掌向下散　　猶如焚香勢　誦此祕密言　　想香雲供養　周遍虛空界　　供養諸聖眾唵鉢娜麼(二合)摯拏(二合)娜度閉(平)吽　次應結花印　　以三十二相　莊嚴諸如來　　觀妙色花雲　運心遍一切　　如前合蓮掌　上散如花勢　　供養諸如來　及諸善逝子　　想滿虛空界　花雲妙芬馥　　寶樹極端嚴　誦此祕密語　　三業齊運用唵鉢娜麼(二合)摯拏(二合)娜補瑟閉(平)吽　眾生無明覆　　離於智慧光　為彼淨除故　　應結智燈印　以前蓮花掌　　禪智竪相逼　心想麼尼燈　　遍照虛空界　所出無量光　　誦此密言曰唵鉢娜麼(二合)摯拏(二合)那儞(儞熠反)閉吽　智者次應結　　解脫塗香印　為淨眾生故　　獻此尸羅香　二手散蓮掌　　當心塗香勢　十度成熏習　　香海遍虛空　獻佛及所尊　　誦此祕密語唵鉢娜麼(二合)摯拏(二合)娜巘提吽　內外供養已　　然後應順念　結祕密本印　　以對密言王　先誦根本言　　分明七遍已　平掌當於心　　忍願如蓮花　進力摩尼狀　　餘度盡如幢　誦根本密言　　思滿有情願密言曰。
translation: "After making these four offerings, it's possible to accomplish the most excellent thing. Next, you should make an external offering, offering it with joy and attention, carrying your mind to an infinite number of realms, burning the lotus flowers for the benefit of sentient beings, as the buddhas sincerely say, scattering the lotus palms downward like the burning of incense. Recite this esoteric statement, imagining the offering of a fragrant cloud of incense, pervading the realm of space, offering it to the noble ones, and then making the seal of the flower.

source_sentence: 娜麼囉怛娜怛囉夜也那莫阿唎耶嚩嚕吉帝濕伐囉耶菩地薩怛嚩(二合)耶麼訶薩怛嚩(二合)耶麼訶迦嚕尼迦耶怛姪(儞也反)他唵斫迦囉靺低真多末尼麼訶鉢娜迷嚕嚕底(丁以反)瑟姹(二合)入嚩攞阿迦哩灑(二合)耶吽發吒薩嚩(二合)訶　次結心祕密　　依前根本印　戒方檀慧縛　　名為本心印　一切諸意願　　應心之所念　由結此印故　　皆悉得成就密言曰。
translation: "Nāmala tanna tanna tanna yaya nama ārya yajñadatta sevarā ye bodhisattva tanna (btn.) yajñadatta (btn.) yajñadatta yajñadatta nama (btn.) ohm cakravartanta vatsa mātṛkā nyi mahoraga paṇḍamati (btn.) saṃkara (btn.) yakṣa (btn.) unphaṭa sarva (btn.) ha Next, he conjures up the secret of the mind relying on the previous fundamental seal, the seal of precepts, the seal of sandalwood, the seal of wisdom, the seal of the original mind, all aspirations, and the thoughts of the mind. Because of this seal, they'll all be accomplished." The secret words are.

source_sentence: 唵鉢那迷真多麼抳入嚩攞吽
translation: "Om pranamaccanta mahoraga nyag-un.

source_sentence: 次結隨心印　　二手堅固縛
translation: second sign of the mudrā, the second hand's firm binding

source_sentence: 進力摩尼形　　禪智並而申
translation: advancing in the power of maṇi form, the combined application of meditation and wisdom

source_sentence: 戒方亦舒直　　檀慧相交竪
translation: the precepts are straightforward, and the exchange of wisdom is straightforward

source_sentence: 誦此心中心
translation: recite this mental center

source_sentence: 密言曰。
translation: The mantra says.

source_sentence: 唵末囉娜鉢娜迷吽
translation: "Om malāna pāna māyā.

source_sentence: 次想尊口中　　流出祕密言
translation: "From the mouth of the next honored one, esoteric words flow forth.

source_sentence: 分明成字道　　五色光照耀
translation: clearly established word-path, illuminated by five-colored light

source_sentence: 間錯殊勝色　　入於瑜岐口
translation: indirectly misplaced excellent form enters the mouth of the yogin

source_sentence: 列心月輪中　　瑩如紅頗黎
translation: in the moon in a row of hearts, as clear as a red banner

source_sentence: 一一諦思惟　　順理隨覺悟
translation: to contemplate each truth in accordance with the principle and then awaken to it

source_sentence: 住定而修習　　入於阿字門
translation: abiding in meditative concentration and cultivation, entering the letter a

source_sentence: 即入輪字觀　　皆遍觀諸字
translation: immediately enters into meditation on the wheel of words, observing them all as a whole

source_sentence: 此名三昧念　　獲智及解脫
translation: This is called samādhi mindfulness, and it leads to knowledge and liberation.

source_sentence: 由此相應故　　不久成種智
translation: because of this association, the cognition of seeds will soon be established

source_sentence: 若常聲順念　　最勝妙奇特
translation: if one is mindful of the constant sound and accordant chanting, it is most excellent, marvelous, and peculiar.

source_sentence: 住於本尊觀　　不應急躁心
translation: abiding in the contemplation of the original Buddha, one should not be anxious

source_sentence: 不高亦不下　　不緩亦不急
translation: neither too high nor too low, neither too slow nor too hasty

source_sentence: 智者離分別　　及諸妄想心
translation: wise person who is free of discrimination and deluded conceptualization

source_sentence: 若誦洛叉遍　　所求皆悉地
translation: if you recite the lakṣa pārijāta, all that you seek will be fully attained.

source_sentence: 二手持念珠　　頗胝與蓮子
translation: two hand-held rosaries, the sphaṭika and the lotus seeds

source_sentence: 螺珠及餘寶　　無瑕光好者
translation: conch-beads and other jewels that are flawless and of excellent brilliance

source_sentence: 當穿一百八　　一一誦七遍
translation: will pierce one hundred and eight, chanting one by one seven times

source_sentence: 心及心中心　　或毘俱多羅
translation: mind and mental centers or vykturā

source_sentence: 作此法加持　　穿貫珠鬘已
translation: after applying this blessing and piercing the beads on the garland

source_sentence: 當心一一度　　與莎訶齊聲
translation: one degree of unity of mind and one degree of unity of voice with the sahā

source_sentence: 一千與百八　　隨力而念誦
translation: one thousand and one hundred and eight recitations, according to one's ability

source_sentence: 四時或三時　　此法後夜勝
translation: four or three seasons This dharma is superior at the end of the night

source_sentence: 如意輪經中　　本教佛所說
translation: in the Ruyilun jing 本教佛所說

source_sentence: 若如是修習　　現世證初地
translation: if one thus cultivates... the first ground of realization in the present life

source_sentence: 過此十六生　　成無上菩提
translation: passing through these sixteen lifetimes and achieving unsurpassed enlightenment

source_sentence: 何況世悉地　　現生不如意
translation: how much more so in the case of the world's siddhi, when the present life is unsatisfactory?

source_sentence: 隨力念誦已　　重結三昧耶
translation: after reciting with energy, he re-establishes the samaya

source_sentence: 復為八供養　　發遣密言主
translation: furthermore, he makes eight offerings and dispatches the master of the esoteric tongue

source_sentence: 二羽堅固縛　　忍願蓮葉形
translation: two feathers of firm binding, the lotus leaf shape of the vow of patience

source_sentence: 從心至面散　　頂上合花掌
translation: from the heart to the face, the palms of the flowers on the top of the head are pressed together

source_sentence: 想尊虛空中　　復道還宮去
translation: conception of the honored one in space and return to the palace on the same road

source_sentence: 密言曰。
translation: The secret words are.

source_sentence: 唵鉢娜麼(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)紇哩穆　發遣聖者已　　自住本尊觀　或於閑靜處　　轉讀摩訶衍　楞伽與花嚴　　般若及理趣　如是等經教　　思惟而修習　誦讀經典已　　自恣行住坐　乃至於寢息　　不間菩提心　不久當悉地　　金剛藏所說　此大悲軌儀　　不擇日及宿　時食與澡浴　　若淨與不淨　常應不間斷　　遠離於散亂　空閑寂靜處　　不營諸世務　念畢發誓願　　結三昧耶印　禮佛菩薩已　　隨意而經行觀自在菩薩如意輪瑜伽一卷
translation: "After sending off the sage, he himself abides in contemplation of the original honored one, or in a quiet place, reads the sutras Laṅkâvatāra and Huayan, Prajñā and the Way, contemplates and cultivates such teachings, recites the sutras, freely walks, stands, sits, goes to bed, and doesn't interrupt the mind of enlightenment. Soon he'll attain the stage of accomplishment as explained in the Vajra collection. This greatly compassionate practice doesn't discriminate between day and night, and when it comes to food and bathing, whether pure or impure, it should always be uninterrupted, free from distraction, in a quiet and peaceful place, and not engaged in worldly affairs. After reciting this, he makes the vow to form the samaya mudrā and pay homage to the Buddha and bodhisattva, and then he freely practices the Avalokitêśvara wish-wheel yoga in one scroll.
